adrFormatAddress: 50 west 72nd st Ground Floor, New York, NY 10023, USA

originalText.text: Incredible studio and even better teachers! I started my Pilates adventure (no prior experience!) with an introductory pack based on the positive google reviews. My hope was to improve my strength, mobility and athletic ability. The results are amazing. As a male in my 40's and a sports enthusiast, I have about many elite professional athletes doing Pilates to improve performance so I thought why not try it. Within just a few sessions, I started to see meaningful results! I could not be happier with my decision to train at Nexa & my only regret is that I did not start sooner! I love my personal training sessions with Anna and the small group classes at Nexa. Highly recommend!

originalText.text:
First time visiting this studio, and absolutely fell in love with the place!
I practice Pilates pretty often, and had past experiences in studios around New York, and Nexa is definitely a place I will be back often.
The place is new, and the machines are nice and colored in white. The instructor was also very caring and it was important for her to give each student the best attention, regarding their body and health situation.
Overall had a great experience, will come back!

originalText.text: My Pilates sessions @Nexa are my "therapy" No place better to be for body/mind restoration and correcting body ailments.  Having experienced 40 years of studios, no place I've been approaches the consistent quality of the Pilates instructors. Anna runs the highest quality studio, and every professional lives up to the standards she expects.   Plus, the studio is a complete cross section of training, wonderfully designed and appointed.   I am so grateful for Nexa. A haven in NYC.   Sandra R.M.

originalText.text: I took my first Pilates class with Maia on 10/21. She was incredibly easy to follow, accommodating of any modifications, and made the class fun! I’ll definitely take another class with her!

text.text: I took my first Pilates class with Maia on 10/21. She was incredibly easy to follow, accommodating of any modifications, and made the class fun! I’ll definitely take another class with her!

originalText.text: NeXa Pilates has become an integral part of my weekly workout/wellness routine. They have the absolute best instructors who are talented, professional and friendly. They always put safety first and know the perfect way to help clients make progress and challenge themselves. In addition to the above, the studio is beautiful and impeccably maintained. I can not recommend them highly enough. Hands down the best Pilates studio.
